backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining access‑controlled user profiles, membership registration, clubs, media-backed content sections, and branding with history and social links management.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs for deployment and GSC verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/docs/android-apk-from-pwa.md: Guide explaining how to wrap the deployed PWA into an Android APK using Trusted Web Activity and Bubblewrap.
frontend/docs/production-deploy-google-s: Deployment guide detailing production workflow and Google Search Console verification steps for versioned releases.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML document setting SEO metadata, PWA tags, Google Search Console verification, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing crawlers while blocking /me/ paths and pointing to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing public site routes with change frequency and priority values.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache version v14 with network-first logic and static asset caching.
frontend/scripts/run-prod-build-with-gsc: Node script that runs the production build and enforces Google Search Console meta tag verification, failing on errors.
frontend/scripts/verify-gsc-meta.ts: Checks dist/index.html for the required Google Search Console meta tag and exits with an error if missing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the application's full route tree using TanStack Router, mapping paths to page components.
frontend/src/components/admin/MediaPicke: Provides a media upload UI with validation, preview, and upload progress using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Restricts access to admin-only pages and redirects unauthorized users to the admin login route.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with static links and dynamically loaded social media icons.
frontend/src/components/HomeBottomNavMen: Provides a mobile bottom-sheet navigation menu linked to primary routes and the 'Me' section.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Displays a PWA installation banner when installable, allowing users to install or dismiss the prompt.
frontend/src/components/SettingsSheet.ts: Offers theme toggling, share-link copying, and PWA installation options within a settings side sheet.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Implements the main top navigation bar with branding, responsive menus, account controls, and settings access.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Returns the branding logo URL with a fallback default asset path.
frontend/src/config/navLinks.ts: Defines primary navigation links and a hook to return the correct '/me' link based on admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Stores admin login state with hardcoded credentials using Zustand and sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt logic, tracking installability, dismissal, and user-triggered installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for branding, history content, memberships, and clubs via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Stores and toggles light/dark theme while applying saved user preference.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and typography styles.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with top navigation, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a public About page with organization story and mission, vision, values cards using static content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAboutPage.tsx: Provides an admin interface to load, edit, add, and save About sections with optional media and links.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Admin page for updating organization branding, mainly uploading and saving a logo.
frontend/src/pages/AdminClubsManagerPage: Admin tool to create, edit, and delete clubs with full form handling and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Main admin dashboard offering navigation to branding, home page, about content, and other management tools.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHistoryEditorPag: Provides an admin interface to edit history text and optional media, loading existing content and saving updates via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHomePageEditorPa: Allows admins to view, edit, add, and remove home page sections with text and images, then save them to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Implements the admin login form, handling credentials, authentication, loading state, and redirects on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMembershipReview: Displays a list of membership registrations with contact details, handling loading and error states for admin review.
Loads and edits social media link URLs, providing a form to update and save the organization's social profiles.
frontend/src/pages/ClubDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single club, handling loading, error, and not‑found states using the club ID from route params.
frontend/src/pages/ClubsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists all clubs in a grid with loading, error, and empty states, linking to individual club detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact methods including email, phone, address, and office hours using card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Renders a list of upcoming static events with details like date, location, and type badges.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Loads and displays organizational history content with optional media and states for loading, errors, or empty content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, dynamic about and homepage sections, and fallback content when backend data is missing.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipRegistratio: Renders a membership registration form with submission handling, success state, and an admin login link.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of predefined youth programs with icons, descriptions, ages, and schedules.
frontend/src/utils/media.ts: Provides media file validation, conversion to Uint8Array, preview URL helpers, and type checks for images and videos.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Updates canonical and Open Graph URLs and provides a helper to refresh SEO-related meta tags for the current route.
frontend/src/utils/theme.ts: Manages dark/light theme persistence in localStorage and applies the theme to the document root.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, with support for hash-based routing and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, radii, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s metadata, feature list, architectural notes, known issues, and generated assets for build and planning.
